name: MotoRaptor - Velociraptor Motorcycle Jurassic Run
description:
MotoRaptor is an awesome velociraptor motorcycle running game.

Jane is a dinosaur, a velociraptor. She's tired of all the jurassic stuff, tired of living confined in the park. The routine is so boring... run through the jungle, fight other dinosaurs, hunt and eat some random worker of the park, repeat. She wants more out of her life.
Chris is the new guy. He loves all jurassic stuff. He's a dinosaur trainer specialized on velociraptors. He starts working on the park on monday.

When Jane meets Chris her world of jurassic stuff changes. Chris teaches Jane how to ride a motorcycle and how to perform some tricks and stunts, and Jane discover what her dream is. She wants to become a motorcycle stunt rider. Then Jane eat Chris (he was not that good anyway), steal the motorcycle, free the other dinosaurs to create some chaos (clever girl), and begin to escape from the park.

Run through the jungle and see how far can you go in this awesome running game. Help Jane the velociraptor escape this jurassic style world and reach her dream!
Compete against your friends to be the best. Compete against the world in the global leaderboards. Endless running game is more fun than ever!

The park jungle is full of obstacles you should dodge. Run, jump, slide, dodge and jump again through all the trees, rocks, fences, buddhas, planes and keep running collecting all the gold coins.
Use powerups to cheat death. Use the coins to upgrade the powerups.

Now that all dinosaurs are running free you should take a look at the Brontosaurus, so nice and friendly, and the T-Rex (tyrannosaurus), not so friendly.

* Dash and dodge as fast as you can!
* Swipe to do lightning fast acrobatics!
* Collect coins to extend your powers!
* Awesome powerups!
* Online leaderboards and achievements!
* A velociraptor riding a motorcycle!
* A Brontosaurus and a Tyrannosaurus Rex!
* Infinite running game! And free!
* Endless run gameplay!

A universal free app with 3D HD optimized graphics.

God creates dinosaurs. God destroys dinosaurs. God creates man. Man destroys God. Man creates dinosaurs.

Music 331Erock
